tourBios.carHigh:
2008: Made eight appearances, six of those via open-qualifying. Best finish was a T11 at the Allianz Championship. Was also T18 at The Ginn Championship at Hammock Beach. 

2007: Best finish was a T22 at the Commerce Bank Championship. 

2006: Recorded his best career finish, a fourth-place performance at the SAS Championship, where he won $120,000. Earned a career-best $220,000 that season...Was the first-round leader at the AT&T Classic.
tourBios.otherInfo: Made 60 PGA TOUR starts, including 28 in 1992 and 21 in 1990. Best finish was a T11 at the 1992 B.C. Open. Also played on the European Tour (1987-89)...Graduate of Mississippi State University, where he was an All-SEC choice in 1976.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Champions was 4th in 2006 at the SAS Championship.
